Lyric:
[00:12.880]I'm gonna love you
[00:15.850]Until you hate me

[00:30.380]I'm gonna love you, I'm gonna love you

[00:36.440]Like a black widow, baby
[00:37.810]This twisted cat and mouse game always starts the same
[00:40.490]First we're both down to play then somehow you go astray
[00:43.390]We went from nothing to something liking to loving
[00:46.370]It was us against the world now we just fucking

[00:52.160]Feeling stupid for all the time that I gave you
[00:54.970]I wanted all or nothing for us ain't no place in between
[00:57.830]By me believing what you say that you never mean
[01:00.870]Like It'll last for ever but now forever ain't as long
